meanings.sent2: The loud noise stunned the audience.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick stunned the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness stunned me like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The incredible goal stunned everyone in the stadium.

meanings.sent1: The boxer was stunned by a powerful punch.
meanings.sent2: The anesthesia will stun the patient before surgery.
meanings.sent3: The knockout punch stunned the opponent into dreamland.
meanings.sent4: The tranquilizer dart stunned the wild animal into sleep.
meanings.sent5: The blow to the head stunned him into temporary oblivion.

meanings.definition: In a state of shock or confusion
meanings.sent1: She stood there, stunned by the sudden turn of events.
meanings.sent2: The students were stunned by the difficult exam questions.
meanings.sent3: His expression was stunned when he saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the landscape left her stunned in awe.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected win left the team stunned and speechless.
